purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 銅)
Pictophonetic: 同 indicates the sound; 钅 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
铜牌 [ tóng pái ]: bronze medal; bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc; Classifiers: 枚
青铜 [ qīng tóng ]: bronze (alloy of copper 铜 and tin 锡 )
铜像 [ tóng xiàng ]: bronze statue; Classifiers: 座
铜板 [ tóng bǎn ]: copper coin; copper plate (e.g. for printing)
青铜器 [ qīng tóng qì ]: bronze implement; refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 钅 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 同 [ tóng ] same, similar; together with, alike
heisig_chinese_memo: This monk worhips a copper metal buddha statue.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I can't believe no one has used this one yet: Copper is metal which looks almost the same as gold. Really, look it up on Wikipedia, it's yellow and it's shiny (atleast in some compounds)!

铜字的基本解释

铜
（銅）
tóng
一种金属元素，富延展性。导电性和导热性都很强，它的合金是电气、机械和国防工业的重要原料：紫铜（纯铜。亦称“红铜”）。青铜。黄铜。铜矿。铜器。铜币。铜臭（ch恥 ）（指铜钱的臭味，用以讥讽唯利是图的人，如“浑身铜铜”）。铜墙铁壁（喻十分坚固，不可摧毁的事物。亦称“铁壁铜墙”）。

铜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóng］
［《廣韻》徒紅切，平東，定。］
“铜1”的繁体字。
(1)金属元素。符号Cu。淡紫红色，延展性、导电性和导热性都很好。古谓之赤金。铜的合金是电气工业、机械工业、国防工业等的重要原料。
(2)铜质器物的省称。（1）铜制乐器。汉贾谊《新书·胎教》：“太子生而泣，太師吹銅，曰'聲中某律'。”（2）铜印。汉扬雄《法言孝至》：“由其德，舜禹受天下不爲泰。不由其德，五兩之綸，半通之銅，亦泰矣。”李轨注：“五兩之綸，半通之銅，皆有秩嗇夫之印、綬，印、綬之微者也。”（3）铜钱，钱。《後汉书·崔寔传》：“﹝崔烈﹞從容問其子鈞曰：'吾居三公，於議者何如？'……鈞曰：'論者嫌其銅臭。'”《初刻拍案惊奇》卷三三：“不過是誤殺子孫，不致償命，只罰些銅納贖。”闻一多《死水·洗衣歌》：“铜是那样臭，血是那样腥。”（4）铜镜·唐孟郊《君子勿郁郁士有谤毁者作诗以赠之》之二：“玄髮不知白，曉入寒銅覺。”明袁宏道《病起偶题》诗之一：“對客心如怯，窺銅只自憐。”清金人瑞《闺怨》诗：“湖州鏡子浄於天，照病臨愁十四年。銅亦命中無福廕，不教一遍得鮮妍。”
(3)比喻坚强、牢固。

铜字的英文翻译

◎ 铜
copper, cuprum

铜字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銅； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1328第06
【唐韻】徒紅切【集韻】【韻會】徒東切，?音同。【說文】赤金也。【本草集解】銅有赤白靑三種。赤銅出川廣雲貴等處，山中土人穴山采礦，鍊取之。白銅出雲南，靑銅出南番。【廣韻】金之一品。【前漢·律歷志】凡律度量用銅者，取爲物至精，不爲燥濕寒暑變節，不爲霜露風雨攺形也。　又自然銅。一名石髓鉛。　又銅靑。【本草集解】銅之精華，卽空綠，以次空靑也。【抱朴子·金丹卷】銅靑塗脚，入水不腐。　又地名。【左傳·成九年】執諸銅鞮。【註】銅鞮，晉別縣，在上黨。【前漢·地理志】益州郡銅瀨縣。　又山名。【前漢·吳王濞傳】吳有豫章郡銅山。　又官名。【前漢·百官公卿表】水衡都尉屬官有辨銅令丞。【註】辨銅，主分別銅之種類也。　又宮名。【左傳·襄三十一年】銅鞮之宮數里。【註】銅鞮，晉離宮。　又人名。【前漢·古今人表】銅鞮伯華。　又【前漢·宣帝紀】金芝九莖，產于函德殿銅池中。【註】銅池，承霤也。以銅爲之。　又【古今注】秦始皇有名馬曰銅爵。　又【史記·孝文本紀】初與郡國守相爲銅虎符。　

铜字的源字形

铜字的起名意思

：一种金属元素，富延展性，喻坚固，强大有力。

copper
Basic explanation of words
copper
(copper)
tóng
A metal element, rich in ductility. Both electrical and thermal conductivity are strong, and its alloy is an important raw material for the electrical, mechanical and defense industries: red copper (pure copper. Also known as "red copper"). bronze. brass. Copper mine. bronze. copper. Copper smell (ch shame) (refers to the smell of copper coins, used to ridicule people who are profiteering, such as "copper body all over"). Bronze wall and iron wall (Yu is a very strong and indestructible thing. Also known as "iron wall and copper wall").
copper
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóng］
["Guangyun" Tu Hongqi, Pingdong, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "铜1".
(1) Metal elements. Symbol Cu. Mauve red, good ductility, electrical conductivity and thermal conductivity. In ancient times, it was called pure gold. Copper alloys are important raw materials for the electrical industry, machinery industry, and defense industry.
(2) Provincial name for copper utensils. (1) Brass musical instruments. Han Jiayi's "New Book · Prenatal Education": "The prince wept when he was born, and the Taishi blew copper, saying'a certain law in the sound'." (2) Bronze seal. Han Yangxiong's "Faithfulness and Filial Piety": "By virtue of his virtue, Shun and Yu are not supported by the world. Not by virtue of his virtue, the five-two lun, and the semi-universal copper, it is also tai." Li Guizhu: "The five-two lun , Half-passed copper, all have the seal and cogwheel of the rank of the husband, and those who have the slightest seal and cogwheel." (3) Copper coins, money. "Cui Miao Biography of the Later Han Dynasty": "﹝Cui Lie﹞ calmly asked his son Jun said:'I live in San Gong, how do you discuss it?'... Jun said:'The critics think it's copper smelly.'" Volume Three: "It's just a manslaughter of children and grandchildren, and it will not pay for life. Only some copper will be paid for redemption." Wen Yiduo "Dead Water·Laundry Song": "Bronze is so smelly, blood is so fishy." (4) Bronze Mirror·Tang Mengjiao "The gentleman should not be depressed and the scholars who have slanderers can write poems to give them" the second: "The black hair does not know the white, and the dawn enters the cold copper." One of the poems of Ming Yuan Hongdao's "Illness Rise and Occasion": "The heart is like a cowardly to the guest. Reflecting on copper is only self-pity." Qingjin Renrui's poem "Boudoir Resentment": "Huzhou mirrors are pure in the sky, and I have been suffering from illness for 14 years. Copper is also hit without blessings, and I won’t be taught it again."
(3) The metaphor is strong and firm.

copper
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Copper; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1328 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Tu Hongqi [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tu Dongqi, with the same sound. [Said the text] Chijin also. 【Explanation of Materia Medica】There are three types of copper: red and white. The red copper was extracted from Sichuan, Guangyun, Gui and other places, and the natives in the mountains were mining in caves, and the chain was taken. The copper-nickel alloy came from Yunnan, and the copper alloy came from Nanfan. [Guang Yun] A product of gold. [Previous Han·Lü History] Where copper is used in the measurement of the law, it is taken as the material to the essence, not for dampness, cold and heat, and not for frost, dew, wind and rain.　Natural copper again. A chalcedony lead.　Tongqian again. 【Materia Medica Collection】The essence of copper, empty and green, and empty and green. 【Baopuzi·Jindan Volume】Bronze coated feet will not rot in the water.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Cheng Jiu Nian] Holding all the bronze scorpions. [Note] Tongyao, Jinbie County, in Shangdang. [Former Han Geography] Tonglai County, Yizhou County.　Also the name of the mountain. [Previous Han·Wu Wangbi Biography] Wu Youzhang County Tongshan.　Also official name. [Previous Han·Baiguan Gongqing Form] Shuiheng Duwei's subordinate officials have distinguished bronze orders. [Note] To distinguish copper, the main difference is the type of copper.　Also the name of the palace. [Zuo Zhuan·Thirty-one Years of Xiang] A few miles in the palace of the Tongji. [Note] Tong Yan, Jin Ligong.　Another name. 【Former Han·Ancient and Modern People's Form】Bronze Dian Bohua.　[Pre-Han Xuan Emperor Ji] Jinzhi nine stems, produced in the bronze pond of Hande Hall. 【Note】Copper pond, also Chengliu. Take copper for it.　[Ancient and Modern Note] Qin Shihuang had a famous horse called Bronze Jue.　[History · Xiao Wenji] At the beginning, it was a bronze tiger symbol with the county guard.

copper
Name meaning
: A metal element, rich in ductility, sturdy, strong and powerful.

化。铜是一种金属元素。
金属元素,符号Cu。淡紫红色,延展性、导电性和导热性
都很强。铜的合金是重要的工业原料。

铜
あ
Пиктофонетические символы.
Золото (год) означает, что медь - это металл; то же самое (тонг) означает звук, и то же самое имеет то же значение, что означает, что медь легко соединяется с другими металлами, чтобы стать упрощением.
Медь - это металлический элемент.
Металлический элемент, обозначение Cu.
Лиловато-красный цвет, пластичность, электропроводность и теплопроводность очень сильны.
Медные сплавы - важное промышленное сырье.
~ Версия ~ Вонючий ~ Ремесленник ~ Шахта ~ Зеленый ~ Аппарат ~ Деньги ~ Шелк
